Deployment for live server **************************
Changing of URIs to root ------------------------ - src/lenyacms/src/webapp/lenya/pubs/computerworld/live-sitemap.xmap Comment out all image transform stylesheets: <map:transform src="xslt/live/images.xsl" label="content"/>
- src/lenyacms/src/webapp/lenya/pubs/computerworld/xslt/navigation.xsl Change to the following line: <xsl:variable name="prefix"><xsl:if test="$authoring">/lenya/computerworld/authoring</xsl:if></xsl:variable>
Performance improvements ------------------------ - build/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.6/conf/server.xml - In Lenya Context, set 'reloadable' to 'false' - Turn off Tomcat logging because Apache keeps an access log (to be done)
- src/lenyacms/src/webapp/sitemap.xmap Turn reloading of sub-sitemaps off: <map:mount uri-prefix="{1}" src="lenya/pubs/{1}/sitemap.xmap" check-reload="false" reload-method="synchron"/>
- src/lenyacms/src/webapp/lenya/pubs/computerworld/sitemap.xmap - Disable mounting of authoring-sitemap.xmap (live environment) - Turn reloading of sub-sitemaps off
- Set logging levels to error
Build ---- - build.properties Add target.reset.excludes
